about_the_game:
Show death who's in charge by playing as a Grave Unit. Utilizing stylish combos, and high pace frantic action, destroy any enemy in your path.

In this demo, utilize 2 unique Grave units named Prayer and Artemis to hunt and take down enemies.

The Dark Hearts, entities who use the power of an infinite energy resource, with minds that are not of this dimension have been taking over man, robots, and anything else they can infect is lingering not only in shadows, but in broad daylight. They must be fought off. Join Prayer, as she regains her ability to fight all that detests humans. While, also getting to know her comrades...

Features:
Diverse Cast- Collect multiple Grave units, each with different playstyles, with even more to come in the future.



Diverse Character Customization- Using Subsystem Chips and multiple weapons collect and build more power in anyway you want to truly make your playstyle original.



Epic Bosses- Fight against god-like bosses who will challenge your existence.

name: Grave-Queen Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Quad 2.4 GHz Core i3 AMD Athlon 64 X2 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800GTS / ATI Radeon HD 2900 XT
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
